title: More Peanuts
description: This collection contains 240 Peanuts strips taken from the three year span of 1952-1954 featuring many of your favourite characters.   The strip’s bitter-sweet humour and child-like innocence helped to cement the Peanuts comic strip’s popularity and secure its reputation as a true, one-of-a-kind, timeless classic.
author: Charles M. Schulz
